name: wallen-{{ app.name }}
label: {{ app.label }}
longDescription: GingerALE is the BrainMap application that is used to perform an ALE meta-analysis on coordinates in Talairach or MNI space. GingerALE can also be used to convert coordinates between MNI and Talairach spaces using the icbm2tal transform. NOTE: Once the job is running, click on Data Files => My Data (Work) and look for the file called GingerALE_dcvserver.txt for connection instructions.
